title: A White Heron - young heroine's adventure

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Jewett uses literary elements and techniques to develop the young heroine’s adventure.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Jewett uses literary elements and techniques to develop the young heroine’s adventure.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
